title: Zacks Announces Rating on ServiceMaster Global Holdings
text: Subscribe Zacks Announces Rating on ServiceMaster Global Holdings ServiceMaster Global Holdings has received a short term rating of strong buy from research analysts at Zacks with a rank of 1. September 28, 2015 ServiceMaster Global Holdings has received a short term rating of strong buy from research analysts at Zacks with a rank of 1, according to Insider Trading Report . The company has been rated an average of 1.36 by 7 Wall Street Analysts. 5 analysts have added the shares in their list of strong buys. 1 stock experts have also rated a buy. 1 broker firms have advised hold. ServiceMaster Global Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:SERV): 7 Analyst have given the stock of ServiceMaster Global Holdings, Inc. (NYSE:SERV) a near short term price target of $42.14. The standard deviation reading, which is a measure by which the stock price is expected to swing away from the mean estimate, is at $1.95. The higher price target estimate is at $45 while the lower price estimates are fixed at $39.
